title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2023
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Friday, 25th August, 2023 211
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 36 OF 2023
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-
Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2023
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2023.
2. A candidate for election as a Councillor in a district and Date and
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the Time of
nomination
returning officer on Thursday, 7th September, 2023, between for election
09:00 hours and 15:00 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Friday, 8th Campaign
September, 2023 at 14:00 hours and close at 18:00 hours on period
Wednesday, 11th October, 2023.
4. (1) A poll for the election of a Councilor in a district Election date
and ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, and time of poll
12th October, 2023, between 06:00 hours and 18:00 hours.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
212 Statutory Instruments 18th August, 2023
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
ELECTION FOR COUNCILLORS
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Ngabwe Lufubu 101011013 Mukubwe
Kalomo Dundumwezi 109004005 Katanda
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 18th day of August, 2023.
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Vice-Chairperson
N. M. MUTITI,
Member
M. CHIPENZI,
Member
LUSAKA
18TH AUGUST, 2023
[EC.101/5/5 CONF.]
